section.title: Introduction:
section.para: This directory is intended to hold any documentation that helps Cinder end-users. This can include concept guides, tutorials, step-by-step guides for using the CLI, etc. Note that documentation this is focused on administrative actions should go into ‘doc/source/admin’.
The full spec for organization of documentation may be seen in the OS Manuals Migration Spec <https://specs.openstack.org/openstack/docs-specs/specs/pike/os-manuals-migration.html>.
